name: Jump Once
description:
A very basic platformer where you can only jump once.

WASD to move. W is also your jump - you can only jump once per level.

R to restart the current level

Red blows you in a specific direction.

Blue means you can't jump in the area.

Yellow is the goal.

Designed for GMT game jam 2019, following the theme "Only once". Very rudimentary - Still very much a novice. Any feedback is welcome.

Build in UE4
